ygData.subject: Re: Utility of Lullaby and Invisibility songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Assist works great for my party.  The only thing that might be called a bug about it, is if you are already fighting the same monster and you hit your assist
ygData.messageBody:
Assist works great for my party. The only thing that might be called a bug about
it, is if you are already fighting the same monster and you hit your assist hotkey
again, you may end up targetting the player you meant to assist, but then, that
would really be an operator error anyway (since you would be assisting the mob that
is fighting the player in your party, assist is actually working as it should). I
don't think Assist is buggy. Probably people are using it wrong. If you have a
main tank that is usually in your party, you can make a hotkey just for that
character (/assist tank). That saves time targeting them and reduces the liklihood
of errors.


> The people in my party use /assist all the time, and we've found it to be very
> very buggy. For some reason, /assist will often have them or their pets attack
> completely different mobs, and we don't know why.
>
> Has anyone else had similar experiences?
>
> Jyzan
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> How many communities do you think join ONElist each week?
> http://www.onelist.com
> More than 5,000! Create yours now!
